Package ClientSide

Class TradingAppDataSource

java.lang.Object
ClientSide.TradingAppDataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockDataSource, NetworkDataSource
abstract class TradingAppDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class defining the operations of a data source for the app.

    • allSellOrders

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> allSellOrders​(java.lang.Boolean resolved)
      Get all sell orders that meet the resolvedness filter
      Parameters:
      resolved - True to get only resolved orders, false to get only unresolved orders, null equivalent to no param
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders that meet the resolvedness filter

    • allBuyOrders

      Returns:

    • sellOrdersByUnit

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> sellOrdersByUnit​(java.lang.String unitName, java.lang.Boolean resolved)
      Get all sell orders placed by members of the requested unit that meet the resolvedness filter
      Parameters:
      unitName - a username
      resolved - Flag describing resolvedness filter: true for "resolved orders only", false for "unresolved orders only", null for "include both resolved and unresolved orders"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders placed by members of the requested unit that meet the resolvedness filter

    • sellOrdersByAsset

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> sellOrdersByAsset​(int assetID, java.lang.Boolean resolved)
      Get all sell orders for the requested asset that meet the resolvedness filter
      Parameters:
      assetID - an asset ID
      resolved - Flag describing resolvedness filter: true for "resolved orders only", false for "unresolved orders only", null for "include both resolved and unresolved orders"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders for the requested asset that meet the resolvedness filter

    • sellOrdersPlacedBetween

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> sellOrdersPlacedBetween​(java.sql.Timestamp start, java.sql.Timestamp end, java.lang.Boolean resolved)
      Get all sell orders with DatePlaced in requested range that meet the resolvedness filter
      Parameters:
      start - Start date
      end - End date
      resolved - Flag describing resolvedness filter: true for "resolved orders only", false for "unresolved orders only", null for "include both resolved and unresolved orders"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders with DatePlaced in requested range that meet the resolvedness filter

    • sellOrdersResolvedBetween

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> sellOrdersResolvedBetween​(java.sql.Timestamp start, java.sql.Timestamp end)
      Get all sell orders with DateResolved in requested range
      Parameters:
      start - Start date
      end - End date
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders with DateResolved in requested range

    • sellOrdersReconciledBetween

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<SellOrder> sellOrdersReconciledBetween​(java.sql.Timestamp start, java.sql.Timestamp end)
      Get all sell orders that were involved in transactions during the requested range
      Parameters:
      start - Start date
      end - End date
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all sell orders that were involved in transactions during the requested range i.e. these sell orders were resolved in the range || are listed as BoughtFrom by buy orders resolved in that range (both checks are needed because a sell order whose quantity was not reduced to 0 by the transaction will only be the latter and a sell order whose quantity was reduced to 0 by a since-deleted buy order will only be the former) The results of this query are a superset to sellOrdersResolvedBetween(start, end)

    • buyOrdersByUnit

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<BuyOrder> buyOrdersByUnit​(java.lang.String unitName, java.lang.Boolean resolved)
      Get all buy orders placed by members of the requested unit that meet the resolvedness filter
      Parameters:
      unitName - the name of an organisational unit
      resolved - Flag describing resolvedness filter: true for "resolved orders only", false for "unresolved orders only", null for "include both resolved and unresolved orders"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all buy orders placed by members of the requested unit that meet the resolvedness filter

    • buyOrdersByAsset

      abstract java.util.ArrayList<BuyOrder> buyOrdersByAsset​(int assetID, java.lang.Boolean resolved)

      resolved - Flag describing resolvedness filter: true for "resolved orders only", false for "unresolved orders only", null for "include both resolved and unresolved orders"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all buy orders for the requested asset that meet the resolvedness filter

      Parameters:
      assetID - an asset ID
      start - Start date
      end - End date
      Returns:

    • insertOrUpdateInventory

      abstract int insertOrUpdateInventory​(InventoryRecord i)
      Insert an inventory record, overwriting any existing inventory record for the same unit and asset. Fails if the unit string or asset ID of the record don't match any real unit or asset
      Parameters:
      i - inventoryrecord object to send
      Returns:
      1 if insert succeeded, 2 if insert failed but update succeeded, -1 if query failed due to nonexistence of unit or asset

    • insertUser

      abstract int insertUser​(User u)
      Insert a user; fails if the username already exists or the user's unit string isn't a real org unit
      Parameters:
      u - user object to send
      Returns:
      1 if insert succeeded, 0 if insert failed due to duplicate key, -1 if insert failed due to nonexistence of unit

    • insertSellOrder

      abstract int insertSellOrder​(SellOrder s)
      Insert a sellorder; fails if the ID already exists (though this should never happen) or if the unit or asset do not exist
      Parameters:
      s - sellorder object to send
      Returns:
      1 if insert succeeded, 0 if insert failed due to duplicate key (should never happen though), -1 if insert failed due to nonexistence of asset or unit

    • insertBuyOrder

      Parameters:
      b - buyorder object to send
      Returns:
      1 if insert succeeded, 0 if insert failed (should never happen though), -1 if insert failed due to nonexistence of asset or unit

      abstract int updateUser​(User u)
      Update a user; fails if the username does not exist in the database or if the unit string does not exist
      Parameters:
      u - user object to send
      Returns:
      1 if update succeeded, 0 if update failed due to nonexistent key, -1 if update failed due to nonexistence of unit

      Parameters:
      s - sellorder object to send
      Returns:
      1 if update succeeded, 0 if update failed due to nonexistent key, -1 if update failed due to nonexistence of asset or unit

    • updateBuyOrder

      abstract int updateBuyOrder​(BuyOrder b)
      Update a buy order; fails if the ID does not exist or if the unit or asset or boughtFrom sell order do not exist
      Parameters:
      b - buyorder object to send
      Returns:
      1 if update succeeded, 0 if update failed due to nonexistent key, -1 if update failed due to nonexistence of asset or unit or BoughtFrom sell order

    • debugDeleteEverything

      abstract int debugDeleteEverything()
      Reset the data-- delete everything and reset auto-increment keys to 1. Exists for test purposes
      Returns:
      The total number of records in all tables before the request was executed

    • recreate

      abstract void recreate()
      Recreate the tables. Does nothing if debugDeleteEverything wasn't just called. Exists for test purposes

      abstract int deleteInventoryRecord​(java.lang.String unit, int asset)
      Delete an inventory record by its composite key
      Parameters:
      unit - Unit name of intended record
      asset - Asset ID of intended record
      Returns:
      1 if deletion succeeded, 0 if deletion failed
